price: 57. Ni diga: ‘Si Al-lah me hubiese guiado, sería de los piadosos’.
arabic: أَوۡ تَقُولَ لَوۡ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هَدَىٰنِي لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: aw taqūla law anna al-laha hadānī lakuntu mina al-mutaqīna
